title: Issues with Login
body: This has been happening to my account the past two days. Every time I have the ~~_"Attempt to Reconnect"_~~ issue I have to restart my wifi, restart my laptop and when I'm about to login my actual username and password it says USERNAME AND PASSWORD NOT FOUND. However, when I do login to the official page it lets me in. The first time this happened I had to change my password. The second time it happened I can not sit around and try to fix it myself so I need to get help so please anyone. ANYONE! please how can I fix this problem. I tried the support site and it keeps happening so how? please for the love of God! HOW?!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for taking so long to get to this thread.

Are you still experiencing this issue? Is your client set to the correct region?
Thank you for replying but I managed to fix it by changing passwords again. :)
